8void furi_hal_bt_serial_start() {
9 // Start device info
10 if(!dev_info_svc_is_started()) {
11 dev_info_svc_start();
12 }
13 // Start battery service
14 if(!battery_svc_is_started()) {
15 battery_svc_start();
16 }
17 // Start Serial service
18 if(!serial_svc_is_started()) {
19 serial_svc_start();
20 }
21}

23void furi_hal_bt_serial_set_event_callback(
24 uint16_t buff_size,
25 FuriHalBtSerialCallback callback,
26 void* context) {
27 serial_svc_set_callbacks(buff_size, callback, context);
28}

30void furi_hal_bt_serial_notify_buffer_is_empty() {
31 serial_svc_notify_buffer_is_empty();
32}

34void furi_hal_bt_serial_set_rpc_status(FuriHalBtSerialRpcStatus status) {
35 SerialServiceRpcStatus st;
36 if(status == FuriHalBtSerialRpcStatusActive) {
37 st = SerialServiceRpcStatusActive;
38 } else {
39 st = SerialServiceRpcStatusNotActive;
40 }
41 serial_svc_set_rpc_status(st);
42}
43
44bool furi_hal_bt_serial_tx(uint8_t* data, uint16_t size) {
45 if(size > FURI_HAL_BT_SERIAL_PACKET_SIZE_MAX) {
46 return false;
47 }
48 return serial_svc_update_tx(data, size);
49}
50
51void furi_hal_bt_serial_stop() {
52 // Stop all services
53 if(dev_info_svc_is_started()) {
54 dev_info_svc_stop();
55 }
56 // Start battery service
57 if(battery_svc_is_started()) {
58 battery_svc_stop();
59 }
60 // Start Serial service
61 if(serial_svc_is_started()) {
62 serial_svc_stop();
63 }
64}
